definition: to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: He breaketh in pieces the strong together with the weak for He regardeth not any man.
sentences.chinese: 他把強者與弱者一同化爲齏粉，因爲他目中無人。

sentences.english: It's not that I don't care about people, I am just very focused on task.
sentences.chinese: 可我並非目中無人，我只是過於關注這件事。

sentences.english: Painfully stylish with a permanent snooty look on their face?
sentences.chinese: 永遠令人痛苦地掛着一副目中無人的時髦相？

sentences.english: The thief said he saw nobody but the gold.
sentences.chinese: 那賊人說他目中無人，只有黃金。

sentences.english: He thought too much of himself and was getting too big for his boots, though he kept his thoughts to himself.
sentences.chinese: 他少年得志，目中無人，不過沒有表露出來。

sentences.english: For the third time the snooted matron totally ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 目中無人的女霸王第三次完全不理睬他。

definition: scholars tend to disparage one another (idiom)
lit. without wind there cannot be waves (idiom); there must be a reason/no smoke without fire
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
lit. love the house and its crow (idiom); involvement with sb and everyone connected/Love me, love my dog.
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to speak incoherently/to ramble/to talk irresponsibly
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
